collection.name: The Watcher
collection.openText: It quietly observes your every move. No words, no interference.

observe.desc: [ {It’s just that it never bothers to communicate with us. Was the last time this happened a few months or a few years ago? No one remembers what it said that time. Probably a compliment, I think. Or maybe I am too stupid, maybe it is a higher being that regards humans as inferior creatures. It might also be yelling at the entire company, right? But it never cared. It observes, monitors, and judges, day after day, without stopping...} ]

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result is good, the Qliphoth counter of $0 will increase it's maximum value (Up to 3)
If an employee is injured while work, all employees in the department to which $0 belongs will be equally injured (even if they leave the department).
When the work result is good or bad, the Qliphoth counter will likely decrease after the countdown.

Attatchment work is changed to trial work, the damage type during trial work will be changed to Pale damage, and the work result must be good (if 7 negative NE-BOX have been produced, the remaining NE-BOX will all be positive PE-BOX)

When $0's Qliphoth counter reaches zero, $0 will escape and appear in the background of the corridor to which the department belongs, moving to the room closest to an employee and continuing to cause a large amount of white damage.
When all employees in that room leave or panic, $0 will move to another nearby room.
When an employee of this department achieves a positive result on a WAW level abnormality or suppresses an abnormality, $0 will stop the attack and return to the containment unit on it's own.
